title: Customized Online Course for Gifted and Advanced Learners to Strengthen Self-Directed Language Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and possession of job-related foundational specialized knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners consist of practitioners who require advanced language use in their current roles but struggle to create self-directed learning environments. As a non-degree course, the design prioritizes practical competency enhancement.

learning_goals: Within three weeks, learners can self-directly establish and implement study plans in target language domains (business reports/presentations)
By course completion, learners achieve over 80% task completion rates driven by intrinsic motivation without external incentives
Through peer feedback and reflective journal analysis, learners improve their self-efficacy in language use by over 20%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
